tool_description:
Ludo King room code API:  an automated bot will initiate a game, and once two players join, it will commence the match and then exit, allowing the two players to continue. 
All matches using this API will automatically begin once two players have joined using the room code.

Email : ludokingapi@gmail.com
name: Ludo King Api Room Code
title: Ludo King Api Room Code

api_list.name: Ludo King room code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ludo-king-api-room-code.p.rapidapi.com/roomCode/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ludo-king-api-room-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ludo-king-api-room-code.p.rapidapi.com/roomCode/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ludo-king-api-room-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
